20110104140550.000|20110104140550.000|CC1|CASE TO TRIAL.

20110104140552.000|20110104140554.000|CC1|THE PROSECUTION IS KENNY        
20110104140554.000|20110104140555.000|CC1|ORTEGA, THE PRODUCER FOR        
20110104140555.000|20110104140556.000|CC1|MICHAEL JACKSON'S "THIS IS IT"  
20110104140556.000|20110104140557.000|CC1|CONCERT TOUR.                   
20110104140557.000|20110104140559.000|CC1|HE IS EXPECTED TO TALK ABOUT A  
20110104140559.000|20110104140602.000|CC1|MEETING WHERE HE CLAIMS DR.     
20110104140602.000|20110104140604.000|CC1|MURRAY SHOWED A RECKLESS        
20110104140604.000|20110104140605.000|CC1|DISREGARD FOR MICHAEL JACKSON'S 
20110104140605.000|20110104140605.000|CC1|HEALTH.                         
20110104140605.000|20110104140607.000|CC1|DR. CONRAD MURRAY, PAID         
20110104140607.000|20110104140610.000|CC1|$150,000 A MONTH TO BE MICHAEL  
20110104140610.000|20110104140611.000|CC1|JACKSON'S PERSONAL DOCTOR,      
20110104140611.000|20110104140612.000|CC1|FACES CHARGES OF INVOLUNTARY    
20110104140612.000|20110104140613.000|CC1|MANSLAUGHTER.                   
20110104140613.000|20110104140614.000|CC1|MURRAY'S ATTORNEYS ARE EXPECTED 
20110104140614.000|20110104140615.000|CC1|TO SAY JACKSON KILLED HIMSELF   
20110104140615.000|20110104140618.000|CC1|WHEN THE DOCTOR WAS OUT OF THE  
20110104140618.000|20110104140619.000|CC1|ROOM.                           
20110104140619.000|20110104140619.000|CC1|DEFENSE ATTORNEYS SAY MURRAY    
20110104140619.000|20110104140620.000|CC1|GAVE JACKSON ONLY 25 MILLIGRAMS 
20110104140620.000|20110104140622.000|CC1|OF THE SLEEP DRUG PROPOFOL ON   
20110104140622.000|20110104140624.000|CC1|THE DAY HE DIED, BUT IT WOULD

20110104143504.000|20110104143508.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN A LONG TIME SINCE     
20110104143508.000|20110104143510.000|CC1|WE'VE SEEN SNOW IN HESPERIA.    
20110104143510.000|20110104143511.000|CC1|IT'S PRETTY AWESOME.            
20110104143511.000|20110104143511.000|CC1|>> THAT'S A GOOD FORT.          
20110104143511.000|20110104143513.000|CC1|>> IT WAS EASY TO BE CREATIVE   
20110104143513.000|20110104143514.000|CC1|IN THE ANTELOPE VALLEY WITH ALL 
20110104143514.000|20110104143517.000|CC1|OF THAT FRESH POWDER ON THE     
20110104143517.000|20110104143518.000|CC1|GROUND.

20110104143556.000|20110104143558.000|CC1|>>> A HEARING TODAY WILL

20110104143624.000|20110104143625.000|CC1|TWO WEEKS.                      
20110104143625.000|20110104143626.000|CC1|NORMALLY IT'S A BORING HEARING  
20110104143626.000|20110104143629.000|CC1|WITH A SMALL AMOUNT OF PEOPLE

20110104143631.000|20110104143631.000|CC1|35 PEOPLE.

20110104143646.000|20110104143648.000|CC1|MEETING WHERE HE CLAIMS DR.

20110104143734.000|20110104143736.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN SPARKED BY A

20110104143742.000|20110104143744.000|CC1|8:00 LAST NIGHT ON MOUNT VERNON

20110104144048.000|20110104144050.000|CC1|>>> NEW HOPE FOR PEOPLE         
20110104144050.000|20110104144051.000|CC1|BATTLING CANCER.                
20110104144051.000|20110104144055.000|CC1|>> YEAH, ONE SIMPLE BLOOD TEST  
20110104144055.000|20110104144056.000|CC1|COULD HELP DOCTORS DETECT       
20110104144056.000|20110104144057.000|CC1|CANCER EARLIER AND BETTER TREAT 
20110104144057.000|20110104144057.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110104144057.000|20110104144402.000|CC1|WE HAVE DETAILS.                
20110104144402.000|20110104144454.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110104144402.000|20110104144405.000|CC1|>>> IN OUR MORNING CHECKUP,     
20110104144405.000|20110104144406.000|CC1|HOPE FOR CANCER PATIENTS.       
20110104144406.000|20110104144407.000|CC1|A SIMPLE BLOOD TEST WHICH CAN   
20110104144407.000|20110104144410.000|CC1|DETECT CANCER, AND HELP THE     
20110104144410.000|20110104144410.000|CC1|DOCTORS TREAT IT.               
20110104144410.000|20110104144413.000|CC1|THIS IS A TEST THAT'S SO        
20110104144413.000|20110104144415.000|CC1|SENSITIVE APPARENTLY THAT IT    
20110104144415.000|20110104144418.000|CC1|CAN DETECT A SINGLE CANCER      
20110104144418.000|20110104144418.000|CC1|CELL.                           
20110104144418.000|20110104144420.000|CC1|A SINGLE CELL AMONG A BILLION   
20110104144420.000|20110104144420.000|CC1|HEALTHY ONES.                   
20110104144420.000|20110104144423.000|CC1|DOCTORS SAY THE TESTS WILL HELP 
20110104144423.000|20110104144424.000|CC1|THEM DIAGNOSE THE DISEASE       
20110104144424.000|20110104144426.000|CC1|EARLIER AND DETERMINE WHAT      
20110104144426.000|20110104144429.000|CC1|TREATMENT WORKS BEST FOR EACH   
20110104144429.000|20110104144430.000|CC1|PATIENT.                        
20110104144430.000|20110104144432.000|CC1|>> WE CAN CHECK TO SEE IF       
20110104144432.000|20110104144433.000|CC1|CHEMOTHERAPY IS MAKING A        
20110104144433.000|20110104144434.000|CC1|DIFFERENCE BY DETECTING CELLS   
20110104144434.000|20110104144436.000|CC1|WITHIN THE BLOOD.               
20110104144436.000|20110104144438.000|CC1|IF IT'S NOT WORKING, THEN WE    
20110104144438.000|20110104144439.000|CC1|CAN STOP THAT CHEMOTHERAPY AND  
20110104144439.000|20110104144441.000|CC1|TRY SOMETHING ELSE SO WE'RE NOT 
20110104144441.000|20110104144443.000|CC1|WASTING TIME TRYING TREATMENTS  
20110104144443.000|20110104144444.000|CC1|THAT DON'T WORK.                
20110104144444.000|20110104144444.000|CC1|>> REMARKABLE.                  
20110104144444.000|20110104144446.000|CC1|BOSTON SCIENTISTS WHO INVENTED
